definition: to carry/to convey/to load/to hold/to fill up/and/also/as well as/simultaneously
to record in writing/to carry (i.e. publish in a newspaper etc)/Taiwan pr. [zai4]/year
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: Briefing of initial experimental study on optical carriers is also given.
sentences.chinese: 扼要介紹關於光頻載波的初步的實驗研究工作。

sentences.english: In this paper, a modulation method for carrier channel with large capacity in optical fibre transmission is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論了利用光纖傳輸大通路載波信號的調製方式。

sentences.english: Some discussions concerning the application and Selected Method of Power Line Carrier Equipment are also given.
sentences.chinese: 最後對電力線載波機的應用和選型問題進行了討論。

sentences.english: A receiver demodulates the carrier signal that arrives from its antenna.
sentences.chinese: 接收器解調變到達它的天線的載波訊號。

sentences.english: Symbols are then mapped to subcarriers and transmitted via antennas.
sentences.chinese: 然後，符號將會映射到副載波，並且經由天線傳送。

sentences.english: COFDM is a digital communication technique of multicarriers.
sentences.chinese: COFDM技術是一種多載波數字通信技術。

sentences.english: Meanwhile a cascaded carrier and phase recovery algorithm was proposed, which is high speed.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種快速收斂的載波恢復及相位恢復級聯算法。

sentences.english: Carrier frequency synchronization is one of the key techniques of OFDM system.
sentences.chinese: 載波同步是正交頻分複用系統的一項關鍵技術。

sentences.english: Low SSB phasic noise conduces to detect be close to signal of carrier wave lown.
sentences.chinese: 低SSB相位噪聲則有助於檢測靠近載波低電平信號。

sentences.english: The thesis points out a new direction for the development of new-style digital carrier machine.
sentences.chinese: 本文爲新型數字載波機的研製指明一個新的方向。

sentences.english: This paper constructs multi-carrier CDMA system.
sentences.chinese: 給出了多載波CDMA系統構架。

sentences.english: In network context: Carrier Sense Multiple Access with Collision Detection.
sentences.chinese: 帶有衝突檢測的載波偵聽多路存取。

sentences.english: The technique is based on digital demodulation of generalised non-linear carrier fringe pattern.
sentences.chinese: 該技術基於廣義非線性載波條紋的數字解調。

sentences.english: Baseband is a network technology in which only one carrier frequency is used.
sentences.chinese: 基帶是一種網絡技術，其中只有一個載波頻率的使用。

sentences.english: Carrier Free Pulse Radar is the important application field of transient electromagnetic theory.
sentences.chinese: 無載波脈衝雷達是瞬變電磁場的一個重要應用領域。

sentences.english: Orthogonal frequency-division multiplexing(OFDM)is an attractive transmission technique for high-bit-rate communication systems.
sentences.chinese: 中文含義爲正交頻分複用，它是一種多載波調製技術。
